short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'butt' and 'my butt' with 'cloud' and 'the cloud'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces occurrences of 'butt' and 'my butt' with 'cloud' and 'the cloud'. This extension is the inverse of the infamous cloud-to-butt extension. If you use both at once, the world won't explode, but you're a very bad person and you should think about what you've done.

Code on Github: https://github.com/paulcretu/butt-to-cloud

Original extension: https://github.com/panicsteve/cloud-to-butt
